msg: Applied fix from trunk for revision: 1416497
Fixed code that was broken a lot of time ago by commit 883226; this prevented the (seldom used) screen.use-cache attribute to work properly. Thanks to K Sharad Bhushan for the patch (OFBIZ-5080).
